hero.title: Universal Music Group
hero.description: Development factory platform managing all music, metadata, delivery and rights holders for Universal's global operations.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Led the complete overhaul of Universal's music metadata and delivery systems, managing multiple teams across different functions. The project required coordinating 120+ engineers across 5 development teams to build a unified platform for the world's largest music company.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.content: Architected and implemented a development factory platform managing all music/metadata/delivery and rights holders for Universal's global operations. The solution unified disparate systems into a cohesive platform serving Universal's worldwide distribution network.

results.title: Results & Impact
results.content: Successfully delivered a global-scale platform that unified Universal Music Group's metadata and delivery systems. The platform enabled efficient management of music rights, streamlined content delivery to digital platforms worldwide, and established a foundation for Universal's digital transformation.
